name: Gangster vs Zombies
description:
Gangsters are stuck in the junk yard and the zombies are coming.......

This is a action game and you need to be fast. The zombies want to knock down these brothers and your job is to help them to defend.

There are a few kinds of gun and you need to build up higher to be safe.

Many game options and tactics are available, the game will guid you through.

Well come to Contra shoot zombies. Good luck & have fun!

The zombies are coming...........................
